intro: Agrostophyllum graminifolium subsp. graminifolium, commonly known as the grassy agrostophyllum, is a perennial herbaceous plant native to southern Africa. This subspecies is adapted to arid and semi-arid environments, showing resilience to drought and nutrient-poor soils.
